Item.Name: Boatwright's Dining Hall
Item.Content:
Boatwright's Dining Hall in Disney's Port Orleans Resort - Riverside, Disney's Port Orleans Resort - Riverside, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Boatwright's Dining Hall

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002448.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Looking for southern hospitality in a casual but creative setting overlooking the Sassagoula River? Your ship’s come in.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: Muddy Rivers
Item.Content:
Muddy Rivers in Disney's Port Orleans Resort - Riverside, Disney's Port Orleans Resort - Riverside, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Muddy Rivers

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002604.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Don’t miss a sippy—let the good times roll at this poolside bar at lushly wooded Ol’ Man Island. Party with frozen and rocks specialty drinks, draft beer, wine, superfruit sangria and nonalcoholic beverages, including the orange freeze.
  Cuisine: American

WDWNT Reviews

Coming soon!

Item.Name: In-Room Dining - Disney's Port Orleans Resort - Riverside
Item.Content:
Pizza Delivery & More - Disney's Port Orleans Resort - Riverside in Disney's Port Orleans Resort - Riverside, Disney's Port Orleans Resort - Riverside, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Pizza Delivery & More - Disney's Port Orleans Resort - Riverside

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/18482730.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Put your hunger to rest—order oven-fresh pizza, even after the sun’s gone to bed! Kick things off with one of our scrumptious starters, sink your teeth into a slice, wash it down with a glass of beer or wine and then seal the deal with some dessert.
  Cuisine: American

Item.Name: River Roost
Item.Content:
River Roost in Disney's Port Orleans Resort - Riverside, Disney's Port Orleans Resort - Riverside, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for River Roost

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002073.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Enjoy the southern comforts of live entertainment by popular cabaret performer Yehaa Bob while sipping southern-style libations like a Southern Hurricane. A full bar is available at this charming old-fashioned watering hole, as are light snacks while the kitchen is open.
  Cuisine: American

Coming soon!

Item.Name: Riverside Mill Food Court
Item.Content:
Riverside Mill Food Court in Disney's Port Orleans Resort - Riverside, Disney's Port Orleans Resort - Riverside, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Riverside Mill Food Court

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002077.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Get a taste of New Orleans at this food court by the big mill wheel that powers a working cotton press. Six stations satisfy any craving: bakery, grill, pizza & pasta, specialties, salads and a carving station. Grab ’n’ go items are available.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted
